I would grade this student's answer as 85.

The student has provided a well-structured response that effectively explains the concept of being an heir in the Christian understanding of receiving God's promises. One area for improvement would be to provide more depth in the discussion of the practical implications of being an heir of God's promises in the lives of believers. Overall, the student has demonstrated a solid comprehension of the theological concept of heirship in Christianity and effectively addressed the concern raised.
